channel.title: Projects on Abhilasha Sancheti
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Abhilasha Sancheti

item.title: Monitoring production line performance to reduce failures
item.description: This project was first floated as a Kaggle competition, with the dataset made available by Bosch. In this work, we pose the task of fault detection as a binary classification problem. The features include numerical, categorical, and timestamp features, and hence warranty a combination of several techniques for efficiently solving the problem. First, a biased sampling method is used to reduce the effect of skewed data distribution. Thereafter, the categorical features are represented as 3 numerical features using sparse online classification algorithms: stochastic truncated gradient (STG), forward-backward splitting (FOBOS), and enhanced regularized dual averaging (ERDA).

item.title: Extension to Erdos Szekeras Theorem
item.description: Worked on devising a Theorem and Conjecture for extension to erdos szekeres theorem.
